Name: Amshay
About the game: Strategically drop beautiful gems and steel beams in an addicting pursuit to capture 100 hideous, insane creatures. Play solo or couch co-op with a friend, searching through the puzzling wasteland in a never-ending battle to get the high score on 12 separate in-game mode combinations. In time attack, you (or you and a friend in co-op) have only 180 seconds to wreak as much havoc as possible. Play on three different board sizes, each with their own wacky strengths and weaknesses. With a riveting choice of Classical or Jazz soundtracks, you'll be humming along for hours in this addictive falling-block puzzler! If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!
